approach: Documentation fix - Add concurrency limitations and last-writer-wins semantics to docstrings and README

changes.description: Added comprehensive documentation to TodoStorage class and save() method about concurrency limitations and last-writer-wins semantics
Added concurrency limitations section warning users about single-user design
Regression tests to verify documentation mentions concurrency limitations

limitations: Does not implement actual file locking or conflict detection
Users must read documentation to be aware of limitations

verification.pytest_results: All 10 tests passed (4 concurrency docs + 6 storage atomicity)
ruff_commands: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/storage.py tests/test_concurrency_documentation.py
